main event: An observer reported seeing three reddish-orange objects in the north and one in the east, which seemed to be observing during his tour of duty.
interesting points: The objects appeared to change in color and brightness,The observer felt the changes were due to their own position relative to the objects,The sighting lasted for 1 minute,The objects emitted a reddish-orange light,The sighting occurred on 24 March 1956 at 2350 hours.
sighted object: three reddish-orange objects and one other object
witness description: the observer was on duty during the sighting
